results.title: The Crazies
results.synopsis: When a plane crashes in a small town, a secret biological weapon is released that turns the residents into homicidal maniacs.

results.title: Legends of the Fall
results.synopsis: The Ludlow clan -- father William and brothers Alfred, Tristan and Sam -- splinters when Sam leaves to fight in World War I against his dad's wishes.

results.title: The Rundown (Welcome to the Jungle)
results.synopsis: Looking to retire and open a restaurant, a bounty hunter gets roped into one final assignment: fetching his boss's errant son from the Amazon jungle.

results.title: Barbie: Princess Charm School
results.synopsis: Blair Willows is excited when she gets to go to Princess Charm School, where she meets princesses Delancy and Hadley, and searches for a magic crown.

results.title: The Last Castle
results.synopsis: Jailed for insubordination, a heroic general is sent to a military prison run by a hard-nosed warden. A battle of wills emerges between the two men.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.synopsis: As Batman, Lt. Gordon and the district attorney continue to dismantle Gotham's criminal underground, a new villain threatens to undo their good work.

results.title: Les lapins cretins: Invasion
results.synopsis: Giant, rambunctious rabbits have invaded and are wreaking havoc on the world. But we'll have to get used to them, because they're not going anywhere!

results.title: Gattaca
results.synopsis: In a future where status is determined by genetics, a genetically flawed man conspires to game the system in order to achieve his lifelong dream.

results.title: Underworld
results.synopsis: A vampire suspects that her mortal enemies, werewolves known as Lycans, are targeting a human. As she shadows him, she finds herself falling in love.

results.title: Bulletproof
results.synopsis: After undercover cop Rock Keats is shot by hapless crook Archie Moses, they team up to thwart a crime boss in this comic tale of unlikely buddies.

results.title: Dr. Seuss' The Lorax
results.synopsis: The forest-dwelling Lorax has to stop the short-sighted Once-ler from ruining the environment for profit in this adaptation of the Dr. Seuss classic.

results.title: An Unfinished Life
results.synopsis: A grieving widow and her daughter move in with her estranged father-in-law in Wyoming, where time allows them to heal and forgive.

results.title: The Dark Knight Rises
results.synopsis: Billionaire Bruce Wayne must once again don the cape of his alter ego, Batman, when Gotham is threatened by new foes such as Catwoman and Bane.

results.title: Blood and Bone
results.synopsis: After five years in jail, Isaiah Bone sets out to avenge a fallen friend. But meting out justice requires immersion in the underground fighting scene.

results.title: The Rainmaker
results.synopsis: A young attorney and a scrappy paralegal work to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company.

results.title: Damage
results.synopsis: A government official strays when he meets a beautiful woman, and soon they begin an affair, even though she is engaged to the official's own son.

results.title: Jane the Virgin
results.synopsis: After vowing to remain chaste until marriage, Jane Villanueva learns she's pregnant due to a medical slip-up and has to rethink her future.

results.title: The Mask of Zorro
results.synopsis: An aging Zorro passes the torch to a young successor, schooling him in discipline and training him to take up the sword against crooked officials.

results.title: Balto
results.synopsis: Balto, who is half wolf and half dog, endures the taunts of disapproving humans as he guides a precious cargo of medicine through the Alaskan winter.

results.title: Akame ga Kill!
results.synopsis: Tatsumi sets out on a journey to help his poor village. When he's rescued by a band of assassins, he joins their fight against the corrupt government.

results.title: Terminator Genisys
results.synopsis: Thirty years after judgment day, John Connor sends a friend back to save his mother and stop the conflagration, unaware that things have changed.

results.title: San Andreas
results.synopsis: A devastating earthquake hits California, and a helicopter pilot and his soon-to-be ex-wife must rescue their daughter before a second one strikes.

results.title: Teen Titans Go!
results.synopsis: Superhero roommates Robin, Starfire, Raven, Beast Boy and Cyborg protect Jump City from evildoers, when they're not too busy bickering and competing.

results.title: Descendants of the Sun
results.synopsis: After a chance meeting in a hospital, an ardent soldier falls for a gifted surgeon. Opposing philosophies tear them apart, but fate has other plans.

results.title: Future Diary
results.synopsis: A boy is forced into a survival game in which players equipped with diaries that can predict the future compete to become the god of space and time.

results.title: Street Fighter II: V
results.synopsis: Ryu and his friend Ken are martial arts fanatics who traverse the globe in search of new techniques to improve their skills in this anime series.

results.title: The Tatami Galaxy
results.synopsis: A nameless college junior considers the different ways his university life could have gone, and whether he'll ever win the heart of his crush, Akashi.

results.title: Prison School
results.synopsis: The five male students of a formerly all-girls school must contend with the draconian Underground School Council and their own lascivious desires.

results.title: Arrival
results.synopsis: A linguist charged with finding a way to communicate with aliens that have landed on Earth uncovers a connection with meaning for mankind and herself.

results.title: Barbie: Video Game Hero
results.synopsis: Pulled into her favorite video game, Barbie becomes a fun, roller-skating heroine who's battling a sinister emoji that's trying to take over.

results.title: The Boss Baby
results.synopsis: A kid finds himself at the center of a sinister corporate plot when his parents bring home a baby who only talks business when they're not around.

results.title: Origin Wars
results.synopsis: In an unstable future, a former military hero enlists the help of an escaped convict to rescue his daughter from impending danger.

results.title: Baby Ballroom
results.synopsis: Step into the cutthroat world of kids' ballroom dancing, where ambitious instructors, proud parents and pint-sized performers waltz to win.

results.title: Guardians of the Tomb
results.synopsis: Searching for missing archaeologists, a rescue team stumbles into an ancient underground burial palace swarming with hostile, deadly spiders.

results.title: Ali Baba ve 7 Cüceler
results.synopsis: A garden gnome vendor and his brother-in-law attend a trade fair in Sofia, where they accidentally stumble into shenanigans involving a mafia boss.

results.title: Pek Yakında
results.synopsis: An ex-movie extra plans to win his wife back by making a fantasy film, but neither he nor his crew has a knack for filmmaking.

results.title: Barbie of Swan Lake
results.synopsis: Featuring Tchaikovsky's music, this animated version of the classic fairy tale stars Barbie as a baker's daughter lost in the Enchanted Forest.

results.title: The Maus
results.synopsis: While traveling with her German boyfriend, Selma is confronted by the violent remnants of the Bosnian War and the ethnic cleansing her family faced.

results.title: Anon
results.synopsis: In a future where technology has rendered privacy obsolete, a detective investigates a serial assassin who has been deleted from all visual records.

results.title: Fifty Shades Darker
results.synopsis: Anastasia embarks on a publishing career, as Christian renegotiates the terms of their relationship. But outside forces threaten to rip them apart.

results.title: Cleo and Cuquin
results.synopsis: Spirited sister-brother duo Cleo and Cuquín try on different professions each day to help their other siblings solve problems and enjoy new adventures.

results.title: Falsa identidad
results.synopsis: Strangers Diego and Isabel flee their home in Mexico and pretend to be a married couple to escape his drug-dealing enemies and her abusive husband.

results.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
results.synopsis: A mission gone wrong forces Ethan Hunt and his team to work with the CIA, and familiar faces, as they race to save the world from nuclear devastation.

results.title: Are You Human
results.synopsis: When a prominent brain scientist and artificial intelligence expert is forced to part with her son, she creates an android robot in his exact likeness.

results.title: Radio Romance
results.synopsis: An assistant writer for a radio program with mediocre skills manages to cast a well-known actor, who can’t say anything without a script.

results.title: Queen for Seven Days
results.synopsis: In the Joseon period, a noblewoman from a powerful clan marries the Crown Prince but is deposed after only seven days as queen when he becomes king.

results.title: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
results.synopsis: A successful executive is determined to do whatever it takes to protect the woman he loves, then meets a travel agent, who may be linked to his past.

results.title: My Golden Life
results.synopsis: A hardworking contract worker desperate for a full-time job finds her life turning upside down after an unexpected revelation about her family.

results.title: Good Manager
results.synopsis: An accountant who’s deft at embezzling funds becomes an unintentional hero to his colleagues when he gets a new corporate job.

results.title: School 2017
results.synopsis: The popular series is back, as students contend with new problems and learn life lessons while dealing with the pressures of growing up.

results.title: Fight for My Way
results.synopsis: A former taekwondo champion and an information desk worker aspire to chase their dreams in a world that isn’t kind to those with mediocre credentials.

results.title: Bangkok Love Stories: Objects of Affection
results.synopsis: A kind computer repairman falls for a street-smart graffiti artist whose multiple personality disorder worsens after she witnesses a double murder.

results.title: Bangkok Love Stories: Plead
results.synopsis: In Bangkok's Chinatown, a spirited digital marketing expert falls for a blind fortune-teller, but their love is predestined to end in disaster.

results.title: Belleville Cop
results.synopsis: After a friend’s murder, a Parisian policeman travels to Miami and teams up with a gruff American detective to bring down the gang responsible.

results.title: Pucca: Love Recipe
results.synopsis: Faced with a threat to the survival of her family restaurant, as well as a rival for Garu's heart, Pucca fights for all that she loves.

results.title: Rainbow Ruby
results.synopsis: Ruby makes magical journeys with her teddy bear Choco to Rainbow Village, where her toys come to life -- and where there's always a problem to solve!

results.title: Robot Trains
results.synopsis: Keeping peace and safety in Train World is no easy task, but for five trains with the power to transform into robots, every crisis is an adventure!

results.title: Chicuarotes
results.synopsis: Leading a life of petty crimes, a pair of teenagers determined to flee the slums of Mexico City fall into riskier schemes in hopes of greater rewards.

results.title: Chappelle's Show
results.synopsis: The brilliant Dave Chappelle performs blistering stand-up, impressions and sketches that skewer topics like racism, politics, celebrities and sex.

results.title: The Immortal
results.synopsis: This standalone story from the world of the “Gomorrah” series explores Ciro Di Marzio’s gangster origins as he faces another showdown with death.

results.title: Weathering with You
results.synopsis: The summer of his freshman year, Hodaka runs away to bustling, ever-raining Tokyo and falls for Hina, a girl who seems able to manipulate the weather.

results.title: Star Blazers 2202
results.synopsis: Three years after the devastating war, a new enemy tests the Solar System’s fragile peace, forcing the Yamato and her crew back into battle.

results.title: No Guns Life
results.synopsis: An ex-soldier with a revolver for a head takes a hunted boy under his wing, putting himself in the crosshairs of the oppressive Berühren Corporation.

results.title: Into the Wind
results.synopsis: Two siblings set sail as a crew on a yacht on the Aegean Sea. Circumstances soon change when a young documentary filmmaker comes aboard.

results.title: Wonder Boy
results.synopsis: This revealing documentary follows Balmain creative director Olivier Rousteing as he brings his bold designs to life and goes in search of his origins.

results.title: Voiceless
results.synopsis: A bright and promising young girl gets abducted and taken to a terrorist camp, where she unexpectedly crosses paths with her soulmate.

results.title: Yu Yu Hakusho: The Movie
results.synopsis: When Koenma is kidnapped, Yusuke and the gang must deliver King Enma's all-powerful Golden Seal to Magma Valley in exchange for his safety.

results.title: Saiyuki
results.synopsis: A renegade priest, a monkey king, a lecherous water sprite and a sympathetic demon team up to form an unlikely band of warriors.

results.title: A Friend of Vincent
results.synopsis: After narrowly escaping an attempt on his life, a womanizing trumpeter pleads with his bandmate to investigate who he may have wronged.

results.title: An Inspector Calls
results.synopsis: A wealthy family’s dinner party gets interrupted by an inspector looking into a tragic death — and everyone present may be linked to the victim’s demise.

results.title: Aram
results.synopsis: Years after joining a militant cell and assisting in a botched assignment, an Armenian man returns to France to close an arms deal and seek revenge.

results.title: Asphalt
results.synopsis: Juliette just wants to get to Montpellier. But her road trip turns into a nightmare when a series of car accidents shatters her plans.

results.title: Before You Leave
results.synopsis: A group of friends spends a weekend in a mountain lodge, where they share secrets, relive old memories and reminisce about what they've lost.

results.title: Bitter Springs
results.synopsis: An Australian sheepherding family and their workers face fierce opposition when they try to a claim a spring on land occupied by an Indigenous clan.

results.title: Blanche and Marie
results.synopsis: In a small village in northern France, two women join the local Resistance cell, fighting against the Nazi occupation alongside their male relations.

results.title: Welcome Aboard!
results.synopsis: Martin is happy to work on his novel during a traffic jam — until a hitchhiker jumps into the car uninvited and begins a philosophical dialogue.

results.title: Welcome to Little Africa
results.synopsis: Threatened with eviction, a group of immigrants in Paris summon help from an unusual ally: a sorcerer back home in Africa.

results.title: The Ones That Got Away
results.synopsis: On a train, six strangers in the same compartment tell one another stories about love and its woes.

results.title: The Hippies
results.synopsis: In 1980s Provence, an uptight sales rep considers a new lifestyle when he encounters a hippie commune where people live and love freely.

results.title: The Christmas Tree
results.synopsis: After the explosion of a plane with a nuclear device in France, a wealthy father goes to extremes fulfilling the wishes of his dying son.

results.title: The Buffoon
results.synopsis: The host of a TV home-shopping show dreams of being a spy. He gets his chance when he crosses paths with a secret agent posing as a suburban dentist.

results.title: The Boat on the Grass
results.synopsis: Two friends, one wealthy and the other poor, build a boat together — but their project and friendship is scuttled by their interest in the same woman.

results.title: The Antidote
results.synopsis: A big-shot industrialist worries that his stutter may jeopardize his ambitions, until he meets a talkative accountant who might just be his antidote.

results.title: Stop Fooling Around... Soldier!
results.synopsis: At a French military outpost, a group of lackadaisical servicemen find plenty of time to make trouble, enjoy nature and pursue beautiful women.

results.title: The Farmer's Wife
results.synopsis: After his daughter’s marriage, a wealthy yet lonely widower flounders as he attempts to find the perfect wife with the help of his lovelorn housekeeper.

results.title: Seven Days to Noon
results.synopsis: Appalled by its destructive power, a scientist threatens to detonate a stolen atomic bomb unless the government halts its nuclear weapons program.

results.title: Against the Wind
results.synopsis: During World War II, a group of trained saboteurs operate behind enemy lines in occupied Belgium. Unbeknownst to them, a traitor lurks in their midst.

results.title: Welcome to Little Africa 2
results.synopsis: A man’s luck turns, and then turns again, when he wins the lottery before getting into a traffic accident that causes him to lose the ticket.

results.title: The Manxman
results.synopsis: In Hitchcock's last silent film, a poor fisherman becomes entangled in a love triangle with his cunning best friend and the daughter of a pub owner.

results.title: 6.5 Special
results.synopsis: Two friends take the train to London in hopes of appearing on a music TV show. To their delight, the hosts and an assortment of pop stars are on board.

results.title: A Touch of Love
results.synopsis: A bookish doctoral student avoids sexual attention only to get pregnant after a one-night stand, leaving her to raise the baby alone in 1960s London.

results.title: Blitz on Britain
results.synopsis: Featuring archival footage from both German and UK sources, this documentary examines the defense of Britain during the early years of World War II.

results.title: Bonnie Prince Charlie
results.synopsis: Exiled prince Charles Edward Stuart raises a force of loyal Scottish followers to seize the English crown in this epic costume drama set in the 1700s.

results.title: Brothers in Law
results.synopsis: An eager young barrister determined to make his mark finds his faith tested when he comes up against the absurd realities of the British legal system.

results.title: Cage of Gold
results.synopsis: A woman deserts her current suitor to marry an old flame. Within hours of the wedding he disappears with her jewelry, leaving her pregnant and alone.

results.title: Cairo Road
results.synopsis: A pair of anti-narcotics agents investigating the murder of a wealthy businessman in Port Said uncover a large drug-smuggling ring in this crime drama.

results.title: Day of Glory
results.synopsis: A retreating German column invades Saint Laurent. As the village tries to adjust, the children accidentally kill a soldier while playing with a grenade.

results.title: The Executioner of Hearts
results.synopsis: While filming on location in Tahiti, a small-time actor seizes an opportunity to make it big, but the attention may be more than he bargained for.

results.title: The Angry Silence
results.synopsis: When the union in his factory walks out on strike, a family man refuses to participate, risking the wrath — and retaliation — of his fellow workers.

results.title: Encounters
results.synopsis: To please her mother, a woman sets out to find a husband, and makes an ambitious plan to find a match — and get married — within one year.
